snippet: Lewis Hamilton pressured Nico Rosberg into a mistake and overtook Rosberg, his Mercedes teammate and rival, to win the Italian Grand Prix in Monza.
abstract: Formula One auto racer Lewis Hamilton wins Italian Grand Prix in Monza.
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton pressured Nico Rosberg into a mistake and overtook Rosberg, his Mercedes teammate and rival, to win the Italian Grand Prix in Monza.
